mapper.select: SELECT c.custKey AS "custKey", c.itemKey AS "itemKey", c.cartKey AS "cartKey", c.cnt AS "cnt", c.rdate AS "rdate", i.price AS "price", i.sale AS "sale", i.img1 AS "img1", i.name AS "name" FROM cart c JOIN customer cust ON cust.custKey = c.custKey JOIN item i ON i.itemKey = c.itemKey WHERE c.custKey = ${custKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET cnt=${cnt} WHERE cartKey = ${cartKey}
mapper.select: SELECT count(cartKey) AS "cartcnt" FROM cart WHERE custKey = ${custKey};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(custKey, itemKey, cnt) VALUES(${custKey}, ${itemKey}, ${cnt});
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET cnt=cnt+${cnt} WHERE cartKey=${cartKey}
